trust_building.name: Trust Building Patterns
trust_building.description: Patterns that establish credibility and voter confidence

value_alignment.name: Value Alignment Patterns
value_alignment.description: Connects policy to voter values and priorities

trust_building::01_proven_success.name: Proven Success Citation
trust_building::01_proven_success.example: 70% voter approval across all demographics in Minnesota
trust_building::01_proven_success.counter_risk: Can seem cherry-picked if not comprehensive

trust_building::02_bipartisan_appeal.name: Cross-Party Support
trust_building::02_bipartisan_appeal.description: Demonstrates broad political appeal beyond party lines
trust_building::02_bipartisan_appeal.example: Even fiscal conservatives support it because it works
trust_building::02_bipartisan_appeal.counter_risk: May dilute progressive identity if overused

trust_building::03_expert_validation.name: Expert Endorsement
trust_building::03_expert_validation.description: Cites credible experts or institutions supporting the policy
trust_building::03_expert_validation.counter_risk: Can seem elitist if not balanced with real stories

value_alignment::01_family_savings.name: Family Economic Benefit
value_alignment::01_family_savings.description: Directly connects to family financial wellbeing
value_alignment::01_family_savings.example: Families save $1,000 annually for local spending

value_alignment::02_community_care.name: Community Solidarity
value_alignment::02_community_care.description: Appeals to shared community values and mutual support
value_alignment::02_community_care.example: When everyone gets it, everyone benefits

value_alignment::03_generational_respons.name: Future Generation Appeal
value_alignment::03_generational_respons.description: Connects policy to children and future prosperity
value_alignment::03_generational_respons.example: Building a world our children can thrive in
value_alignment::03_generational_respons.counter_risk: Can seem abstract without concrete benefits

evidence_strength::01_hard_numbers.name: Concrete Statistics
evidence_strength::01_hard_numbers.example: 150 million meals served in first year
evidence_strength::01_hard_numbers.counter_risk: Numbers must be accurate and verifiable

evidence_strength::02_comparison_framing.name: Relatable Comparison
evidence_strength::02_comparison_framing.example: $2/day per student costs less than coffee

evidence_strength::03_historical_precede.name: Historical Success
evidence_strength::03_historical_precede.description: Cites historical examples of similar success
evidence_strength::03_historical_precede.example: CCC created 3M jobs during Great Depression

counter_narrative::01_myth_busting.name: Direct Myth Correction
counter_narrative::01_myth_busting.description: Directly addresses and corrects false narratives
counter_narrative::01_myth_busting.example: Contrary to myths, Medicare runs more efficiently
counter_narrative::01_myth_busting.counter_risk: Can amplify the myth if not careful

counter_narrative::02_reframe_waste.name: Efficiency Reframing
counter_narrative::02_reframe_waste.example: Complex bureaucracy is the real waste - universal is simpler

counter_narrative::03_flip_narrative.name: Narrative Reversal
counter_narrative::03_flip_narrative.description: Flips opposition talking points back on them
counter_narrative::03_flip_narrative.example: Private insurance is the real government bureaucracy
counter_narrative::03_flip_narrative.counter_risk: Can seem too clever if overused

emotional_resonance::01_personal_story.name: Human Impact Story
emotional_resonance::01_personal_story.description: Centers real human experiences and impacts
emotional_resonance::01_personal_story.example: No child feels ashamed getting lunch
emotional_resonance::01_personal_story.counter_risk: Stories must feel authentic not manipulative

emotional_resonance::02_dignity_framing.name: Human Dignity Appeal
emotional_resonance::02_dignity_framing.description: Frames policy as preserving human dignity

emotional_resonance::03_hope_possibility.name: Aspirational Vision
emotional_resonance::03_hope_possibility.description: Paints hopeful picture of what's possible
emotional_resonance::03_hope_possibility.counter_risk: Must balance hope with concrete steps

action_motivation::01_urgency_creation.name: Urgency Without Panic
action_motivation::01_urgency_creation.description: Creates sense of urgency without fear-mongering
action_motivation::01_urgency_creation.example: The time has come to fix our healthcare system

action_motivation::02_empowerment.name: Voter Empowerment
action_motivation::02_empowerment.description: Makes voters feel their action matters
action_motivation::02_empowerment.example: Your vote can bring these savings to families

action_motivation::03_clear_choice.name: Binary Choice Clarity
action_motivation::03_clear_choice.description: Presents clear choice between two futures
action_motivation::03_clear_choice.example: We can choose investment or continued struggle

weakness::01_vague_promises.name: Vague Promise
weakness::01_vague_promises.example: This will somehow make things better

weakness::02_jargon_overload.name: Policy Jargon
weakness::02_jargon_overload.description: Uses insider language that alienates voters

weakness::03_defensive_posture.name: Defensive Framing
weakness::03_defensive_posture.description: Starts from defensive position against attacks
weakness::03_defensive_posture.example: Despite what critics say, this isn't socialism
